{{tag}}
Time to cook about {{food.cookTime}}
{{food.price | currency}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/services/cart.service'; import { ServiceFoodService } from 'src/app/services/service.food.service'; import { Food } from 'src/app/shared/models/food'; @Component({ selector: 'app-food-page', templateUrl: './food-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./food-page.component.scss'] }) export class FoodPageComponent { food!: Food; constructor(activatedRoute:ActivatedRoute, foodService: ServiceFoodService, private cartService:CartService, private router: Router){ activatedRoute.params.subscribe((params)=> { if(params.id) this.food = foodService.getFoodById(params.id); }) } addToCart(){ this.cartService.addToCart(this.food); this.router.navigateByUrl('/cart-page'); } }
